description: This schema represents a medication schedule, based on the prescription e.g., atenolol 50 mg, 1 tablet at 8:00 and and 0.5 tablet at 8 pm for 30 days, with a window of +/- 1 hour.

acceptable_window.description: The amount of time before and after the set time during which it is still acceptable to take a dose of the medication. If missing, the dose must be taken at the exact time.
